dmca.title: DMCA Complaint from Jagex RuneScape yupmart.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringement%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, March 02, 2007 3:25 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3296983H] RE: DMCA Complaint from Jagex RuneScape yupmart.com

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

MIME element (text/plain) 
Dear Sirs, 
 
You had helped us previously with this matter. Yupmart.com is once again 
unlawfully trading in RuneScape (RS) items. 
 
We ask that you please remove that part of the site. 
 
Yours faithfully, 
 
Adlex Solicitors 
www.adlexsolicitors.co.uk 
Tel: +44 (0) 207 317 8404 
Fax: +44 (0) 207 317 8405 
Mob: +44 (0) 7775 635 835 
76A Belsize Lane, London NW3 5BJ 
  
The sender does not guarantee that this message including any attachment is 
secure or virus free. Also, it is confidential and may be privileged or 
otherwise protected from disclosure. If you are not the intended recipient, 
do not disclose or copy it or its contents. Please telephone or email the 
sender and delete entirely from your system. 
 
-----Original Message----- 
From: legal-response@theplanet.com [mailto:legal-response@theplanet.com]  
Sent: 09 August 2006 21:20 
To: yxo@adlexsolicitors.co.uk; copyright@theplanet.com 
Subject: DMCA Complaint from Jagex RuneScape yupmart.com 
 
To Whom It May Concern: 
 
 
 
This letter confirms that access to the materials referenced in your 
below-pasted complaint has been disabled. 
 
 
 
Legal Response Team 
 
The Planet 
 
 
 
 
--------- 
 
 
From: Daniel Greenberg [mailto:yxo@adlexsolicitors.co.uk] 
 
Posted At: Friday, August 04, 2006 4:17 AM 
 
Posted To: Legal Response 
 
Conversation: DMCA Complaint from Jagex RuneScape yupmart.com 
 
Subject: RE: DMCA Complaint from Jagex RuneScape yupmart.com 
 
 
 
 
 
Dear Sirs 
 
 
 
The website is still is still unlawfully trading in RuneScape (RS) items. 
 
We require that you remove this part of the website. 
 
 
 
Yours faithfully 
 
 
 
Adlex Solicitors   
 
George Poletes, Corporate Counsel 
The Planet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway 
Suite 110 
Dallas  
Texas 75207 
U.S.A. 
 
 
Dear Sir, 
 
www.yupmart.com (
